column11: This urban resort hotel stands adjacent to a beautiful sightseeing area in Kurashiki, and features a limestone lobby with a high ceiling and spacious rooms starting at 40 square meters with luxury bathrooms. Enjoy French Cuisine at "Hachikengura", and Japanese cuisine at "Kurashiki", both prepared by first-grade chefs.

column13:
From Kurashiki Station (JR Sanyo Line) South Exit: About 10 minutes on foot, or 3 minutes by taxi.
By car: Exit the Sanyo Expressway at Kurashiki IC and continue along Route 429 for about 15 minutes (5 km).
